Request method: POST Request URI: https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth Proxy: <none> Request params: <none> Query params: <none> Form params: <none> Path params: <none> Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: <none> Multiparts: <none> Body: { "password": "password123", "username": "admin" }

testcase.name: testCreateBooking
testcase.system-out:
Request method: POST Request URI: https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking Proxy: <none> Request params: <none> Query params: <none> Form params: <none> Path params: <none> Headers: Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: <none> Multiparts: <none> Body: { "firstname": "create", "lastname": "Doe", "totalprice": 150, "depositpaid": true, "additionalneeds": "Breakfast", "bookingdates": { "checkin": "2024-06-01", "checkout": "2024-06-10" } }
===== RESPONSE RECEIVED ===== {"bookingid":976,"booking":{"firstname":"create","lastname":"Doe","totalprice":150,"depositpaid":true,"bookingdates":{"checkin":"2024-06-01","checkout":"2024-06-10"},"additionalneeds":"Breakfast"}}

testcase.name: testUpdateBooking

Request method: PUT Request URI: https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/booking/976 Proxy: <none> Request params: <none> Query params: <none> Form params: <none> Path params: <none> Headers: Cookie=token=9c010fb77a520da Accept=*/* Content-Type=application/json Cookies: <none> Multiparts: <none> Body: { "firstname": "updateed", "lastname": "UpdatedDoe", "totalprice": 200, "depositpaid": false, "additionalneeds": "Lunch", "bookingdates": { "checkin": "2024-06-05", "checkout": "2024-06-15" } }
